HomePage.title: Welcome to an Internationalized Next.js App

AboutPage.israel: The State of Israel is located in the Middle East, along the Mediterranean Sea.It was established in 1948 and serves as the national homeland of the Jewish people. The country is home to citizens from various communities, including Jews, Muslims, Christians, and Druze. Jerusalem is the capital, and Tel Aviv is an important cultural and economic center. The weather in Israel is diverse—rainy winters and hot, dry summers. Despite its small size, Israel has significant influence in technology, science, and agriculture.
